```
import java.util.*;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		int[] arr = new int[n];
		long sum = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			arr[i] = sc.nextInt();
		}
		
		Arrays.sort(arr);
		long now = 1;
		
		for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--) {
			if(arr[i] - (now - 1) > 0) 
			{
				sum += (arr[i] - (now - 1));
			} else break;
			now++;
		}
		
		System.out.print(sum);
	}

}
```
